result.execSummary:
The defendant Darrel Lee Bale was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Iron County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Def shall pay $25 per month commencing 7/15/17 and due the 15th of every month thereafter.    Failure to make court ordered payments will result in termination of payment plan and all available enforcement actions will be taken without further notice.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Darrel Lee Bale

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Def appears in person, lodged on warrant.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case.  Requests small signature bond.  Then offers to amend to City DC $137.50.  Def agrees with offer.  Court amends to  City DC and imposes $137.50.  Court orders def to pay $20 per month.  WCCS.  Adj.  klr

Defendant Darrel Lee Bale not in court.  Martin J Lipske appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case, cites appearances.  Requests bench warrant for non-appearance.  Court authorizes bench warrant.  klr
Pre-trial conference on December 5, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 6, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Darrel Lee Bale
Current: N12166 Bale Ln., Ironwood, MI 49938   (Effective: 08-17-2016)
Prior: N Lake Rd., Ironwood, MI 49938

Defendant Darrel Lee Bale in court.  Martin J. Lipske appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA calls case.  Complaint served.  Court to enter NG please on def's behalf.  Defendant discusses resolution but DA wants to have pretrial conference.  Court explains NG plea.  Defendant to meet with DA to discuss case.  Def wants to proceed pro se.  PTC to be scheduled.  klr

Defendant Darrel Lee Bale in court, in custody.  Frederick j Schellgell appeared for the State of Wisconsin via phone.  Court calls case.  Public defender information fiven to defendant.  DA reuqests $250 cash bond with conditions.  Court questions law enforcement and defendant.  DA requeswts $500 signature bond once verifies welcome at father's residence can leave.  Other conditions are no alcohol, no controlled substances, no taverns.  Bring back on 7/18/16 at 10:30 a.m.  Address is N12166 Bale Lane, Ironwood, MI.  Set for initial.  klr
NO ALCOHOL, NO TAVERNS, NO CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES.

Defendant Darrel Lee Bale in court.  Frederick j. Schellgell appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant present but no complaint filed yet.  Defendant advised he is free to go and will be sent a summons for next court appearance.  klr
